actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-957.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for funds for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of $407,800 by the House Committee on the District of Columbia for inquiries and investigations. Allocates $50,000 to be expended for the procurement of consultant services. Requires the chairman of the Committee to furnish the Committee on House Administration information with respect to any study or investigation intended to be financed from such funds.

titles.title: A resolution providing for funds for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on the District of Columbia.
